pageContent: Background: Abiraterone acetate (AA), oral CYP17 inhibitor, is an active agent in the treatment of metastatic castrate-resistant prostate cancer (mCRPC).

metaData.source:
Recent trends in the use of radical prostatectomy in England: the epidemiology of diffusion
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/12603408/
